snippet: TRAGER--Seymour. Beloved husband of the late Joan. Treasured father of Barbara Katz, Michael and the late Marlene Kevy. Devoted father-in-law of Cara and Larry. Cherished grandfather of Jonathan, Lauren, Jessica, Melissa, Eric, Alyssa, Rachel, Ben...
lead_paragraph: TRAGER--Seymour. Beloved husband of the late Joan. Treasured father of Barbara Katz, Michael and the late Marlene Kevy. Devoted father-in-law of Cara and Larry. Cherished grandfather of Jonathan, Lauren, Jessica, Melissa, Eric, Alyssa, Rachel, Ben and Matt. Best friend to Flo Feldman. Service Wednesday 10am, Sinai Chapel, 162-05 Horace Harding Expressway, Fresh Meadows.
